main.description: I'm a Full Stack Developer interested in web development. I started as PHP/Python developer, mantaining and creating MVC applications with Yii/Django and Jquery but in the last years, I have been working with NodeJS( I can't get out ) building REST endpoints in the Backend and working with Single Page Applications and Progressive Web Apps in the Frontend with React or just Vanilla Javascript. I also crossed the line into the DevOps world a couple of times, provisioning servers with ansible and Bashscript, creating Docker containers, playing around with cloud services as AWS or Firebase and setting up CI/CD pipelines with Travis. I like to get involved in all aspects of Software Development as you can read and I always focus on the best practices and standards of software development.

dealerbuilt.description: I'm working on Dealerbuilt as a contractor in the IT department, developing solutions for services intercommunication,  custom CLI tools for backups generation with AWS S3 integration and setting up internal Monitoring Systems for all Postgres database servers that we have to watch with alerts system. Also, I created a couple of small Electron apps and REST endpoints for an internal purpose.

rebelstack.description_1: I am part of a small community of Node JS developers. We are related to Lima's
